::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Alliance Base/WarMachine::

Zardus frowns as the Alliance base shakes a bit, glancing down on his 
scanners. A bot had appeared out of no where, and had opened fire on 
WarMachine. Visuals reported that eight other bots were moving behind 
the base, but they were obviouslty illusions, since they didn't 
register on scanners.

"Come with me," he says to Najah, walking out of the lan and running 
of down a hallway.

"Alliance troops," he says into his comm, "The base is under attack 
by one bot. More may be cloaked. If you'll be defending the base, 
don't let any of them past you. Some of the bots are holograms, so 
use your scanners."

He orders the Alliance base's computer to begin a cloak scan, the 
scanners getting to work as he heads for the exit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recieving Zardus' transmission, Reptilica sighs, jumping to his feet 
and pulling out his gun.

He runs out of the bridge, heading for the exit
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica passes Bloodystrike as Bloodystrike recieves Zardus' 
transmission. The Alliance bot spins around, following Reptilica.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Alliance base detects weapon fire, the autoguns firing at Inu.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
WarMachine roars as lances strike him in the back, spinning around to 
fire missiles at Inu from his shoulder missile launchers. His good 
arm was now charred from the blast, the hand disabled.
